General.Name: Orient Cement Limited
General.Description: Orient Cement Limited manufactures and sells cement in India. The company offers pozzolana and ordinary Portland cement under the Birla.A1 brand. Its products are used in residential, commercial, infrastructure, industrial, and community projects. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in New Delhi, India.

6.Name: Mr. Keshav  Sharma
6.Title: Sr. VP of Marketing & Bus. Excellence
